languages.text: По позолоченному блюду прыгают мелкие власоеды. Дама давит их золотым молоточком, но насекомые продолжают сыпаться в еду с ее прически.
Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.
languages.original_text: По позолоченному блюду прыгают мелкие власоеды. Дама давит их золотым молоточком, но насекомые продолжают сыпаться в еду с ее прически.

traits.locale_text: Tiny hair-eaters are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, but more of them fall from her coiffed hair into her food.
Tiny hair-eaters are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, but more of them fall from her coiffed hair into her food.
Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.
Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

languages.text: 金箔をあしらった皿のまわりを、小さなシラミたちが飛び跳ねている。貴婦人は小さな黄金のハンマーで虫を潰すが、そのたびに、整えられた髪からさらにシラミがこぼれ落ち、食べ物の中へと落ちていった。
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: 金箔をあしらった皿のまわりを、小さなシラミたちが飛び跳ねている。貴婦人は小さな黄金のハンマーで虫を潰すが、そのたびに、整えられた髪からさらにシラミがこぼれ落ち、食べ物の中へと落ちていった。

languages.text: Küçük bitler, yaldızlı tabağın üzerinde zıplıyor. Kadın, ufak altın bir çekiçle onları eziyor ama daha fazlası saçlarından tabağına düştükçe düşüyor.
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: Küçük bitler yaldızlı tabağın üzerinde zıplıyor. Leydi, ufak altın bir çekiçle onları eziyor ama daha fazlası saçlarından tabağına düştükçe düşüyor.

languages.text: Pequeños piojos saltan en torno al plato dorado. La mujer los aplasta con un pequeño martillo del mismo color, pero caen más de su pelo recogido a la comida.
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: Pequeños piojos saltan en torno al plato dorado. La mujer los aplasta con un pequeño martillo del mismo color, pero caen más de su pelo recogido a la comida.

languages.text: 几只小虱子在镀金的盘子里跳来跳去。这个女士举起一把金色的小锤子，砸扁了这些虱子，结果更多虱子从她的头发里跳出来，落进了她的食物里。
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: 几只小虱子在镀金的盘子里跳来跳去。这个女士举起一把金色的小锤子，砸扁了这些虱子，结果更多虱子从她的头发里跳出来，落进了她的食物里。

languages.text: Une nuée de poux minuscules sautille sur l'assiette dorée. La femme les écrase à l'aide d'un petit marteau, doré lui aussi, mais ils tombent toujours plus nombreux de sa coiffure extravagante pour atterrir directement dans sa nourriture.
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: Une nuée de poux minuscules sautille sur l'assiette dorée. La femme les écrase à l'aide d'un petit marteau, doré lui aussi, mais ils tombent toujours plus nombreux de sa coiffure extravagante pour atterrir directement dans sa nourriture.

languages.text: Auf dem polierten Teller tummeln sich winzige Läuse. Die Dame tötet die Insekten mit einem kleinen goldenen Hammer, aber aus Ihrer auftoupierten Frisur fallen immer mehr Läuse in ihr Essen.
languages.original_text: Tiny lice are hopping around the gilded plate. The lady squashes the insects with a small golden hammer, only for more of them to drop from her coiffed hair and into her food.

traits.locale_text: Auf dem polierten Teller tummeln sich winzige Läuse. Die Dame tötet die Insekten mit einem kleinen goldenen Hammer, aber aus Ihrer auftoupierten Frisur fallen immer mehr Läuse in ihr Essen.
